<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We assume the size of the object is never greater than CodeModelLargeSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To handle CodeModelLargeSize changes to AsmPrinter would be required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#ac01fb290af1907633ce3c08fa92b25e7">ReadOnlySection</a>;</span></CodeLine>
